Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2|~Dice~|~Equipment:Lockpickaxe~|~Equipment:Spanella~|~Equipment:Shell Game~); leveluprewards(3|~~|[~Upgrade~|~Equipment:House of Glass~|~Equipment:Medirang~]); leveluprewards(4|~Dice~|[~Equipment:Corpse Maggots~|~Upgrade~|~Equipment:Dark Arts~]); leveluprewards(5|~~|[~Equipment:Unimplemented Item~|~Equipment:Filler Item~|~Equipment:Unbalanced Item~]); leveluprewards(6|~Dice~);

Description: I'm also a wizard! Isn't that worth something?!
Rules Description: Skillcard replaced with Spellcasters Quarterly|Spellcasters Quarterly spawns new equipment|But you still have an inventory[;] not a spellbook

Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2|~Dice~); leveluprewards(3|~~|[~Equipment:Molotov Cocktail~|~Equipment:Doppeltwice~]); leveluprewards(4|~Dice~); leveluprewards(5|~~|[~Upgrade~|rand([~Equipment:Scrap Book~|~Equipment:Scrap Club~|~Equipment:Scrap Spear~|~Equipment:Scrap Nettle~|~Equipment:Scrap Bump~])|~Copy~]); leveluprewards(6|~Dice~);
Script: On Start Turn: var sk = self.getskillcard(); for(skill in sk.skills) { if(skill.script == ~/*feedme*/~) { sk.animate(~flashandshake~); attackself(999); sfxdamage(self|999); sfx(~_drain~|~~|0.15); } }

Rules Description: No spellbook.|Instead[;] you have a torn spellbook on rental from Jester.|Get items according to dice you roll!|No manual casting.
Equipment: Cauldron|Snowcast|Thunderclap|Mote of Light|Hand o' Flame|Magic Key

Description: Magnificus would be proud.|WIP. DO NOT PLAY.
Rules Description: No spellbook.|Instead[;] you have a Jester deck full of magic cards|that need colored Mox to work.
Equipment: Energy Conduit|Energy Conduit|Magibot|Magibot|Magibot|Shieldbot|Gamblobot|Magic Oil|Magic Oil|Magic Oil|Magic Oil|Emerald Crystal|Emerald Crystal|Emerald Crystal|Peridot Golem|Senior Sage|Junior Sage|Greenbeard|Goobert|Geck|Geck|Squirrel|Squirrel|Squirrel|Cat|Wolf|Stoat|Starvation
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: /* TODO! Also TODO cutscenes and TODO generator */ leveluprewards(2|~Dice~|[~Boosterpack:Pack Rat[;]Geck[;]Squirrel~[;]~Boosterpack:Trapmage[;]Peridot Golem[;]Emerald Crystal~[;]~Boosterpack:Lonely Wizbot[;]Magic Oil[;]Energy Conduit~]);

Rules Description: You make jackpot rewards out of enemy items.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2|~CPU:2~); leveluprewards(3|~~|[~Equipment:Buster Counter~|~Equipment:Ultimastrophe~]); leveluprewards(4|~CPU:2~); leveluprewards(5|~~|[~Equipment:Process Management~|~Equipment:Buster Potion~]); leveluprewards(6|~CPU:2~);
Script: Start Game: runscript(~quickmod/findmissinggadgets~); Rules.excludeenemies(getcolumn(loaddata(~diceydungeons/excludedenemies~)|~robot1~).concat([~Sticky Hands~])); self.usecpuinsteadofdice = true; if(!self.varexists(~skills~)) { self.setvar(~skills~|[~Lucky Shot~|~Regenerate~]); } Rules.overworldbutton_name = ~Victims~; Rules.overworldbutton_action = ~rulescreen~; if(!self.varexists(~victims~)) { runscript('quickmod/robot_updaterulescreen.hx'|[null]); } Rules.jackpotskills = [~Replace Me~|~Replace Me~|~Replace Me~]; Rules.inventor_inspiration = true; Rules.inventor_setgadgets(1); self.getskillcard().height = 1080; //if(!self.varexists(~mycpu~)) { self.setvar(~mycpu~|9); } self.roll_target = self.getvar(~mycpu~);
Script: After Level Up: //if(self.level % 2 == 0) { self.setvar(~mycpu~|self.roll_target + 2); trace(~mycpu: ~ + self.getvar(~mycpu~)); } else trace(~didnt get cpu this levelup~);
